title: Magic Clone

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose someone during the day to learn their ability to use at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can use your target's ability at night.
- With the Necronomicon, any ability you learn will be permanent. You can't have 2 permanent copies of the same role.
- With the Necronomicon, you will get an ability to deal a basic attack to 1 player.
- With the Necronomicon, you can use all your permanent learned abilities at the same time every night.
